column5: Hi all, Got half an hour in before Jack's bedtime the other night, he and Roloff joined me for the last few casts ..if you cant stand the wife playing the Yamaha organ just out of view on the lawn, skip to the end of the video (3:42) HILARIOUS!https://youtu.be/lv4z3kPOv2g
COOL video - Isn't it amazing how a dog can focus so intently on something.
Beautiful spot for shore fishing! Just thinking though, hope Roloff doesn't decide to grab one while still hooked, could turn out to be an expensive vet bill!
Very cool. My son's GWP will actually retrieve live walleyes out of the live well.
